translation.en: [young man] I didn't really have your typical upbringing.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas eu une enfance ordinaire.

translation.en: I mean, I did at first, but then the world ended.
translation.fr:
Enfin si, au début,
puis la fin du monde a frappé.

translation.en: I don't think anyone was really shocked.
translation.fr: Ça n'a surpris personne, je crois.

translation.en: We always thought it might, and then it just finally happened.
translation.fr:
On a toujours su que c'était possible
et c'est arrivé.

translation.en: But how it happened, now that's where it gets interesting.
translation.fr:
C'est la manière dont c'est arrivé
qui est intéressante.

translation.en: Agatha 616.
Yep, an asteroid heading straight for Earth.
translation.fr:
Oui, un astéroïde
qui fonçait sur la Terre.

translation.en: I know. So obvious.
So, humanity came together, and we did what we do best.
translation.fr:
L'humanité s'est unie
pour faire ce qu'on fait de mieux.

translation.en: We shot a bunch of rockets at it! And we blew it up! And it was great!
translation.fr:
On a tiré des missiles dessus !
Il a explosé ! Super !

translation.en: But it wasn't. You see, the thing that makes rockets rockets--
translation.fr:
Ou pas…
Ce qui rend les missiles efficaces,

translation.en: chemical compounds, a lot of 'em.
Which rained back down on us, and everything changed.
translation.fr:
Ils nous sont retombés dessus
et tout a changé.

translation.en: And by "everything," I mean cold-blooded creatures.
translation.fr:
Par "tout",
je veux parler des créatures à sang-froid.

translation.en: And by "changed," I mean mutated and started eating us to death.
translation.fr:
"Changé" car elles ont muté
et commencé à nous dévorer.

translation.en: Ants, lizards, roaches, crocodiles. You name it. There's a lot of 'em.
translation.fr:
Fourmis, lézards, cafards, crocodiles…
Tout. Il y en a beaucoup.

translation.en: I knew this one kid who was eaten in his sleep by a goldfish he won at a carnival.
translation.fr:
Je connais un gosse qui a été bouffé
par le poisson rouge qu'il avait gagné.

translation.en: -[growls] -Man, Todd loved that goldfish.
translation.fr:
Je connais un gosse qui a été bouffé
par le poisson rouge qu'il avait gagné. Todd adorait ce poisson rouge.

translation.en: And that cat.
So, for most of human history, if you wanted to kill a cockroach,
translation.fr: Avant, quand on voulait tuer un cafard,

translation.en: all you needed was a shoe.
Well, suddenly you needed a shotgun.
translation.fr: Il a soudain fallu un fusil.

translation.en: And sometimes even a tank.
And sometimes even that doesn't work.
translation.fr: Et ça ne marche pas toujours.

translation.en: Especially if you don't stay in the tank, Bob.
translation.fr:
Surtout si tu ne restes pas
dans le tank, Bob.

translation.en: Eventually, the really big ones and our military took each other out.
translation.fr:
Les très gros et notre armée ont fini
par s'entretuer.

translation.en: We lost 95% of the human population in about a year.
translation.fr:
On a perdu 95 % de la population humaine
en un an.

translation.en: That's a lot of Bobs.
translation.fr: Ça fait un paquet de Bob.

translation.en: And a lot of Todds.
Those of us who survived, we hid anywhere we could--
translation.fr:
Les survivants se sont cachés
où ils pouvaient :

translation.en: bunkers, caves, panic rooms, all around the world.
translation.fr:
bunkers, grottes, chambres fortes,
dans le monde entier.

translation.en: So for the last seven years I've been living in an underground bunker.
translation.fr:
Depuis sept ans,
je vis donc dans un bunker souterrain.

translation.en: It's not-- It's not as bad as it sounds. Really.
translation.fr: C'est pas si terrible que ça.

translation.en: It's a great group of people, and we all love each other.
translation.fr: C'est un super groupe et on s'adore.

translation.en: It's kinda what I imagined college would have been like.
translation.fr:
C'est un peu comme ça
que j'imaginais la fac.

translation.en: -[panting] -[woman] Are you sure he's asleep?
[man] Who?
-[woman] Joel. Who else? -[man] Yeah. He's asleep.
translation.fr:
- Joel. Qui d'autre ?
- Oui. Il dort.

translation.en: -[woman] Hang on. Shh. -[man] He's not awake.
-[woman] Are you sure? -It's just you.
translation.fr:
- Tu es sûr ?
- T'en fais pas.

translation.en: [woman] I just-- I don't…
[man] Joel. Joel.
[whispering] See? He's not awake.
translation.fr: Tu vois ? Il n'est pas réveillé.

translation.en: -It's just you. -[woman sighs]
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am wide awake.
translation.fr: Chère Aimée, je suis bien réveillé.

translation.en: I've just gotten good at not really moving or breathing.
translation.fr:
Je suis devenu très fort
à ne pas bouger ou respirer.

translation.en: Being stuck in a survival bunker
with a bunch of people who have all found their soul mate is less than ideal.
translation.fr:
avec des gens qui ont trouvé l'âme sœur
est loin d'être idéal.

translation.en: Karen and Ray got together a few months ago,
translation.fr:
Karen et Ray se sont mis en couple
il y a quelques mois,

translation.en: so they're still kinda in their honeymoon phase.
translation.fr:
donc ils sont encore
en pleine lune de miel.

translation.en: -[Karen, Ray continue moaning] -It is super physical.
Good for them, you know. They're both very attractive and apparently quite flexible.
translation.fr:
Tant mieux pour eux. Ils sont très beaux
et apparemment assez souples.

translation.en: Hey, life's short. Especially down here.
translation.fr:
Mais bon, la vie est courte.
Surtout ici.

translation.en: -Oh. Hey, Ava. -[Ava] Hey, Joel.
-[man] Joel. How's it going? -It's going good, Tim.
translation.fr:
- Joel. Ça roule ?
- Ça va bien, Tim.

translation.en: -How are you-- How are you doing? -[Tim] Yeah, good.
[Joel] Cool.
-I couldn't sleep. -[Ava] Yeah, we know the feeling.
translation.fr:
- J'arrive pas à dormir.
- Nous, c'est pareil.

translation.en: Yeah. Probably not for the same reasons.
translation.fr: Oui. Sûrement pas pour les mêmes raisons.

translation.en: You guys's, uh, door's open. Is that-- Did you know that?
translation.fr: Votre porte est ouverte. Vous le saviez ?

translation.en: -[Ava] Yeah. -[Tim] Yeah, we know.
Okay.
[Joel] After Tim's parents were eaten by termites,
translation.fr: Des termites ont mangé les parents de Tim.

translation.en: he and Ava became inseparable.
Okay. Good night.
-In every way. -[both] Night.
That's the asteroid they named 616 Agatha.
translation.fr:
C'est l'astéroïde
qu'ils ont appelé Agatha 616.

translation.en: And these are all the chemical bombs they sent up to try and…
translation.fr:
Voici les bombes chimiques
qu'ils ont envoyées…

translation.en: [Joel] So, pretty much everyone's coupled up down here.
translation.fr: Ici, presque tout le monde est en couple.

translation.en: Our first baby was born last winter. It was super emotional.
translation.fr:
Le 1er bébé est né l'hiver dernier.
C'était très émouvant.

translation.en: Welcome to the apocalypse, kid.
The food sucks. At least you'll never know what you're missing.
translation.fr:
On mange mal,
mais tu ne sauras pas ce que tu rates.

translation.en: Kala and Connor got together after Carol died.
translation.fr:
Kala et Connor se sont mis ensemble
après la mort de Carol.

translation.en: Carol was a cow who ate a box of laundry detergent.
translation.fr:
Carol était une vache
qui a mangé de la lessive.

translation.en: -And now we only have one cow. -[cow mooing]
translation.fr: Donc, on n'a plus qu'une vache.

translation.en: Her name's Gertie.
Gertie is great.
Gertie's not our only food source.
translation.fr: On a d'autres sources de nourriture.

translation.en: We have a hunting party that brings back whatever they can from the surface.
translation.fr:
Notre équipe ravitaillement ramène
tout ce qu'elle peut de la surface.

translation.en: It was easier in the beginning, you know, before we ran out of bullets.
translation.fr:
C'était plus facile au début,
quand on avait encore des balles.

translation.en: Facing down one of those things with a janky handmade weapon
translation.fr:
Affronter une de ces créatures
avec une arme artisanale pourrie,

translation.en: is no walk in the park.
Or so they tell me. I-I don't go on the hunting parties.
translation.fr: Enfin, il paraît. Je n'y vais jamais.

translation.en: They need me in the kitchen. I'm kinda the… -[chopping] -…the chef of the bunker.
translation.fr:
Ils ont besoin de moi en cuisine.
Je suis le cuisinier du bunker.

translation.en: Everyone likes my minestrone.
Being the only single person in the bunker has its perks too.
translation.fr:
Être le seul célibataire du bunker
a aussi ses avantages.

translation.en: I get to hang out with Mavis.
Of course, she's not much for conversation anymore.
translation.fr: Bien sûr, elle ne parle plus beaucoup.

translation.en: Her core battery's shot, just like every other Mavis, I'd imagine.
translation.fr:
Sa batterie est à plat,
comme toutes les Mav1s, j'imagine.

translation.en: Actually never seen a working one.
translation.fr: Je n'en ai jamais vu fonctionner.

translation.en: [Joel] Sure wish you were here, Aimee.
translation.fr: J'aimerais que tu sois là, Aimée.

translation.en: I'd love for you to meet everyone.
translation.fr: J'aimerais te présenter tout le monde.

translation.en: [Joel] Oh, yeah.
Maybe we could do a little target practice together.
It's kinda my thing.
Well…
-Sorry, Mavis. -[Gertie moos]
[Connor] Hustle, hustle, people. We gotta move.
[grunting] Guys!
Guys! I got the weapons.
-Stay. -What?
-Get what you need, and let's go. -What's happening? What's going on?
translation.fr:
- Prenez le nécessaire, on y va.
- Qu'y a-t-il ?

translation.en: -[Connor] We're breached. -Breached?
translation.fr:
- Il y a une intrusion.
- Une intrusion ?

translation.en: -Joel. -What do you mean?
-Like inside-the-bunker breached? -That's what "breached" means, kiddo.
translation.fr:
- Dans le bunker ?
- C'est ce que ça veut dire.

translation.en: [whispers] Breached.
Anna Lucia and I will engage. Anderson and Tim, flank us.
translation.fr:
Anna Lucia et moi attaquerons.
Anderson et Tim, sur les côtés.

translation.en: Flank 'em, yeah, okay. Where do you guys need me? The rear, or--
translation.fr:
Sur les côtés, OK.
Et où je me mets ? À l'arrière ?

translation.en: -I thought we were past this, Joel. -Past what? You need help. I can help.
translation.fr:
- On a déjà parlé de ça, Joel.
- De quoi ? Je peux aider.

translation.en: -Let me help. -You gonna make me say it?
translation.fr:
- Emmenez-moi.
- Je dois vraiment le dire ?

translation.en: -Say what? -You can't handle it, Joel.
translation.fr:
- Dire quoi ?
- C'est trop pour toi, Joel.

translation.en: -You're shook. -Okay, yeah.
-So, you guys don't get scared ever? -[Connor] We get scared.
[Tim] We all get scared, Joel, but you get really scared.
translation.fr: On a tous peur, mais tu es pétrifié.

translation.en: -We're not trying to make you feel bad. -We love you, Joel.
translation.fr:
- On ne dit pas ça méchamment.
- On t'adore.

translation.en: [Connor] But you're unsafe.
-[Tim] You're a liability. -Even on supply runs.
translation.fr:
- Tu es un boulet.
- Même pour le ravito.

translation.en: Okay, why did that speech feel so rehearsed?
translation.fr: Vous avez répété ce discours ou quoi ?

translation.en: -Connor. -[device beeps]
Okay, 30 meters out. Let's move.
-Be careful, Connor-Bear. -I will, Kala-Bee.
[Connor] Load out.
Go with them.
[Karen] They're getting close.
-[gasps] -[Ava] Shit.
[Karen whispers] Oh, my God.
-[Anderson] It got one of 'em. -[Karen] What about the others?
translation.fr:
- Il en a eu un.
- Et les autres ?

translation.en: They're coming back.
They need help. I'm going.
translation.fr:
- Joel !
- Ils ont besoin d'aide. J'y vais.

translation.en: [Kala] Joel! Wait!
-[whispering] Connor? -[faint groan]
Did I shoot it, or did you?
What do you think?
You.
[Joel] Oh, and I have a pretty severe freezing problem.
translation.fr: J'ai une fâcheuse tendance à me figer.

translation.en: But I am working on it.
-[woman whispers] How is it looking? -I think it looks really good.
-Does it look like me? -Yeah.
Are you sure that this pose looks natural?
translation.fr: Tu es sûr que cette pose est naturelle ?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah?
I think it's really good.
What are you doing? Don't move.
-Will you let me see it? -Don't-- Don't move. Aimee.
translation.fr:
- Tu me montres ?
- Bouge pas. Aimée.

translation.en: -I really wanna see it. -[growls]
[laughs] Can I see it?
Okay.
Okay.
-Ready? -Mm-hmm.
[Joel] What do you think?
Why do I have a beard? [snickers]
No, that's shading. I did the shading.
My head is-- is so large.
-You have a big head. -And my hand is so tiny.
translation.fr:
- Tu as une grosse tête.
- Et ma main est minuscule.

translation.en: You have tiny hands.
I love it. I frickin' love it.
-That's super sweet, 'cause it's terrible. -[Aimee laughs]
translation.fr: C'est très gentil, parce qu'il est nul.

translation.en: -I got you something too. -What?
translation.fr:
- J'ai un truc pour toi.
- Quoi ?

translation.en: I don't know if these are the right ones.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si ce sont les bons.

translation.en: No way. These are the ones that I-I-I wanted to get.
translation.fr: J'hallucine ! Ce sont ceux que je voulais.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-What's happening right now? -Uh--
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm dancing with my shoulders.
translation.fr:
- Ça va ?
- Oui, je danse avec les épaules.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -Oh, yeah.
This has been the best summer of my life.
translation.fr: J'ai passé le meilleur été de ma vie.

translation.en: Mine too.
What are you doing?
-Do you know what time it is? -Uh, I think it's, like, 6:30.
translation.fr:
- Tu sais quelle heure il est ?
- Je crois qu'il est 18h30.

translation.en: Aimee, you're-- you're scaring Crocodile Carl.
translation.fr: Aimée, tu fais peur à Crocodile Carl.

translation.en: Okay, look away, Crocodile Carl.
Oh. Look away. Hey, I get it.
-[Aimee giggles] -I get it.
We need to go.
I'm scared.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, This week has been especially shitty.
translation.fr:
Chère Aimée,
cette semaine a vraiment été merdique.

translation.en: We lost Connor to what looked like a really big ant.
translation.fr:
On a perdu Connor
à cause d'une grosse fourmi.

translation.en: Helps me to draw them.
I try to capture their essence, scribble down some notes on how to kill them.
translation.fr:
J'essaie de leur tirer le portrait,
de noter comment les tuer.

translation.en: Sometimes I think it's the only way I know how to cope with these things.
translation.fr:
Je crois que c'est mon seul moyen
de gérer tout ça.

translation.en: -[switch clicks] -This is 7045. Come in, 3022.
-I repeat, come in, 3022. Over. -[switch clicks]
[woman] This is 3022. What is it now, Ray?
Hey, Janice. No, it's actually-- It's, uh, Joel.
translation.fr: Salut, Janice. Non, en fait, c'est Joel.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Oh. Joel. -Yeah.
All right. Hold on one second.
Aimee, it's Ray!
It's Joel. Thanks, Janice.
-[Aimee] Joel! Hey! -Hey, Aimee! Hi!
-How are you? -Hi. Yeah, I, uh-- I'm good.
translation.fr:
- Ça va ?
- Salut. Oui, ça va.

translation.en: -It's so good to hear your voice. -I'm so sorry.
translation.fr:
- C'est bon d'entendre ta voix.
- Je suis désolée.

translation.en: I heard on the open frequency that one of you guys got killed.
translation.fr:
J'ai appris sur la fréquence libre
que vous avez eu un mort.

translation.en: Yeah. Breached the bunker.
translation.fr: Oui. Une intrusion dans le bunker.

translation.en: Wow. Actually got inside?
translation.fr: Bon sang, ce truc est entré ?

translation.en: Yeah. It's the first time it's happened. It was kinda scary.
translation.fr:
Oui. C'est la première fois que ça arrive.
C'était flippant.

translation.en: Did you have to fight it too?
translation.fr: Tu as dû te battre aussi ?

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, a little. I had to fight it a little bit.
translation.fr: Oui. J'ai dû me battre un peu.

translation.en: Actually got super ripped since the last time you saw me, so--
Oh. Wow! [giggles] Super ripped, huh?
Yeah, I was kidding. I'm not super ripped. That was just a bad joke.
translation.fr:
Je rigole. Je ne suis pas baraqué.
C'était une blague débile.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you're okay.
translation.fr: Je suis contente que ça aille.

translation.en: Thanks. Yeah.
I am still kinda blown away that you were even able to find my colony on this thing.
translation.fr:
Dire que tu as trouvé ma colonie
sur ce machin.

translation.en: I know. It's pretty crazy.
'Cause I found it on the first one. What are the odds?
translation.fr: Et du premier coup. Quel bol !

translation.en: -[both chuckle] -[Aimee] Crazy.
Yeah. No, I-I called-- I called, like, 90.
Hey, you know what I, uh-- know what I wish sometimes?
What?
That I could, like, s-snap my fingers and be back in that car with you.
translation.fr:
Claquer des doigts
et me retrouver dans la voiture avec toi.

translation.en: Man, that'd be nice.
Yeah. Too bad it's, uh…
you know, impossible.
Kinda feels like everything is impossible these days.
Taking care of this whole colony is exhausting.
translation.fr:
C'est épuisant
de m'occuper de toute la colonie.

translation.en: I, uh-- I-I write you letters.
Really?
Yeah. Yeah, I-I write you letters sometimes.
-Aw! -All the time.
I'd love to read 'em.
-Really? I would love to read them to-- -[static surges, stops]
-No. Aimee? -[switches clicking]
[Joel] We've lost a lot of people over the years.
translation.fr: On a perdu beaucoup de monde.

translation.en: You'd think you'd get numb to it after a certain point.
translation.fr: On devrait s'y faire, à la longue.

translation.en: You don't.
-I'm sorry. -Thank God! Where have you been, Joel?
We have to go right now. Say your goodbyes, get in the car.
translation.fr:
On doit partir.
Dis au revoir, et en voiture.

translation.en: -I should go. -Maybe you should come with us.
translation.fr:
- Je dois y aller.
- Viens avec nous.

translation.en: -No, my mom is waiting. I'm sorry. -[creature roaring]
Get in the car! Aimee, you need to hurry home now!
translation.fr: En voiture ! Aimée, rentre vite chez toi !

translation.en: -I want you to have this. -What? This is Crocodile Carl.
It's your good luck charm.
-Be careful. -You too.
Aimee.
I love you.
I love you too.
I'm gonna come find you.
You better.
[Aimee's voice] You better.
[Anna Lucia] I wanna know how it got in.
[Ray] It appears to have ripped through one of our perimeter defenses.
translation.fr: Elle a percé notre périmètre de sécurité.

translation.en: [Ava] It ripped through steel?
[Tim] Anderson and I resealed the breach point and vent.
translation.fr:
On a réparé la brèche et l'aération
avec Anderson.

translation.en: -Nothing's getting in that way again. -But why did it happen?
translation.fr:
- Plus rien ne rentrera.
- Comment c'est arrivé ?

translation.en: It was a freak occurrence. There's no reason to think it'll happen again.
translation.fr:
Par malchance.
Aucune raison que ça se reproduise.

translation.en: -[Ray] We should try to stay calm. -[all arguing]
-How far away is Aimee's colony? -[arguing stops]
-What? -Aimee's colony.
-How far away is it? -About 85 miles.
-How long does that take to get there? -You're not actually thinking of going?
translation.fr:
- Le trajet prendrait combien de temps ?
- Tu n'es pas sérieux ?

translation.en: Tim, just… humor me.
-How long? -Seven days.
Minimum.
An armed and trained hunting party would be lucky to last 50 miles on the surface.
translation.fr:
Une équipe armée et entraînée aurait
de la chance de faire 80 km.

translation.en: But you, Joel…
All right, now I need volunteers
to help reinforce some of the outer perimeter.
-[Anna Lucia] Yeah, I'm gonna go. -[all chattering]
-Ava's got this. -[Karen] Exactly.
I'm gonna go.
It's an impossible journey, Joel.
No, I'm serious.
I love you guys, but there's one person in this world
translation.fr:
Je vous aime, mais il n'y a qu'une personne
qui m'ait jamais rendu heureux,

translation.en: who ever truly made me happy,
translation.fr:
mais il n'y a qu'une personne
qui m'ait jamais rendu heureux,

translation.en: and she's only 85 miles away.
And I'm gonna go see her.
That felt awesome.
[Joel] Dear Aimee, I am done hiding.
translation.fr: Chère Aimée, je ne me cacherai plus.

translation.en: I'm done waiting for things to get better.
translation.fr: Je n'attendrai plus que ça s'arrange.

translation.en: It's time to take matters into my own hands.
translation.fr: Je vais prendre les choses en main.

translation.en: Time to let someone else make the minestrone.
translation.fr:
Laisser quelqu'un d'autre
préparer le minestrone.

translation.en: I'm taking a radio, even though it doesn't have power.
translation.fr:
Je prends une radio,
même si elle n'est pas alimentée.

translation.en: But I'm gonna take it anyway.
-Wish me luck, Gertie. -[Gertie moos]
Mavis, take care of her.
You're not joking, are you?
Nope. Nope, I'm not.
He's not joking.
We're not letting you leave, Joel. You're needed here.
translation.fr:
On ne te laissera pas partir.
On a besoin de toi.

translation.en: Tim, no, I'm not. Come on. I don't do anything.
translation.fr: Non, Tim, c'est faux. Je ne fais rien.

translation.en: Joel, that's not true. You fix the radio. You make the minestrone.
translation.fr:
Joel, c'est faux. Tu répares la radio.
Tu prépares le minestrone.

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. Doesn't sound as important when I say it out loud.
translation.fr: D'accord. Ça ne rend rien, dit comme ça.

translation.en: I appreciate you trying. Really, I do.
I just don't feel like I belong anywhere.
translation.fr: Mais je ne suis pas à ma place.

translation.en: I don't really wanna die all alone at the end of the world, so…
translation.fr:
Je ne veux pas mourir seul
pendant la fin du monde.

translation.en: Look, I know you guys all just think of me as, like, some little, pathetic,
translation.fr:
Écoutez, je sais que vous me voyez
comme un petit hérisson pathétique

translation.en: adorable hedgehog.
But I can take care of myself. I'm actually probably a lot stronger than you might think.
translation.fr:
Mais je peux me débrouiller.
Je suis plus fort que vous ne le pensez.

translation.en: -We made you a map. -Thanks, Karen.
translation.fr:
- On t'a fait une carte.
- Merci, Karen.

translation.en: Just… take care.
Everything will try to kill you.
Be observant. Use the advantages that you have.
-You're fast and small, so… -Right.
translation.fr:
- Tu es rapide et petit.
- Je vois.

translation.en: -Don't fight. -Don't fight.
Just run and hide.
Thanks, Ray.
You're an asshole if you get eaten.
translation.fr: Tu es un connard si tu te fais bouffer.

translation.en: -Okay. -Nice.
I love you guys. Tell Aimee I'll see her in seven days.
translation.fr:
Je vous aime.
Dites à Aimée que j'y serai dans 7 jours.

translation.en: -[Anderson] We believe in you. -[Tim] Love you, buddy.
translation.fr:
- On croit en toi.
- On t'aime.

translation.en: Where am I?
Well, it's not super useful.
Okay, well, you know what? We know we gotta head west. Right?
translation.fr:
Tu sais quoi ?

Oh, shit, we're gonna die. We're dying.
translation.fr: Merde, on va y passer. On va crever.

translation.en: No! [screaming]
That was amazing.
What? Uh--
Amazing? Me?
-Yeah. -You thought I was…
-Thank you, Joel. -Yeah?
Yeah, well, I would've done it different, but… you did all right.
translation.fr:
J'aurais fait autrement,
mais tu as bien fait.

translation.en: Oh. Okay.
Sorry. Yeah, just…
That's looking better. Take care of it.
translation.fr: Ça va mieux. Prends soin de toi.

translation.en: -[Rose] Bye now. -Bye, guys.
-Can you move this? Yeah. -[Joel] Aimee.
-Hey. -Hey. Um…
I gotta get back to my colony, see if they're okay.
translation.fr:
Je dois retrouver ma colonie
pour voir si ça va.

translation.en: Right, yeah. Yeah.
Some friends of mine told me that there's a place in the mountains,
translation.fr:
Des amis m'ont parlé
d'un endroit dans les montagnes,

translation.en: I guess, that's safe from the monsters.
So maybe we'll all head there.
Um, it was really cool to just-- to see you in action,
translation.fr:
C'était vraiment cool
de te voir en action,

translation.en: and… I don't know, how you take care of all these people, and then…
translation.fr:
je ne sais pas comment tu fais
pour t'occuper d'eux et…

translation.en: -Oh. -I'm so glad you came.
translation.fr: Tu as bien fait de venir.

translation.en: I gotta go.
I'm worried about 'em.
Yeah.
But I had something for you. Um…
[Aimee] Oh, my God.
Crocodile Carl?
-Oh, my God. -I know. [chuckles]
Thought you should have him back finally.
Here, uh…
-No, I can't take that. You need it. -No, no, no.
translation.fr:
- Je ne peux pas. Tu en as besoin.
- Non.

translation.en: I want you to take it. It'd mean a lot to me.
Really, take it. Um…
I got it all up here, anyway. So I can always make copies.
translation.fr:
J'ai tout mémorisé.
Je peux en faire des copies.

translation.en: Thanks for inspiring me to…
take this trip.
It's the best decision I ever made.
All right, uh, I'm gonna go.
-Yeah. -Boy, come on!
-Uh, be careful. -Yeah, you, too.
-Bye, Aimee. -Bye.
That was…
-Great. -Yeah.
I'll come find you.
You better.
Okay.
[Joel] My name is Joel Dawson.
I'm 24 years old, and I survived seven days on the surface.
translation.fr:
J'ai 24 ans
et j'ai survécu sept jours à la surface.

translation.en: Twice, actually.
-Joel? -Joel?
-[chattering, gasping] -You guys! Hey!
-Oh, my God! -Hey, hey, hey!
I'm alive because of the generosity of a few strangers
translation.fr:
Je suis en vie
grâce à la générosité de quelques inconnus

translation.en: and the kindness of a great dog.
translation.fr: et la gentillesse d'un super chien.

translation.en: My colony and I are headed to the mountains.
translation.fr: Ma colonie part dans les montagnes.

translation.en: There's supposed to be less monsters there.
translation.fr: Il y a moins de monstres, paraît-il.

translation.en: And don't get me wrong. The surface is a dangerous place.
translation.fr:
Et ne vous méprenez pas.
La surface est un endroit dangereux.

translation.en: But I don't think hiding underground is the answer anymore.
translation.fr:
Mais se cacher sous terre n'est plus
la solution.

translation.en: There is a great big, beautiful, inspiring world out there.
translation.fr:
Un monde gigantesque, beau
et inspirant nous entoure.

translation.en: [on radio] And I know you think it might be impossible, but it's not.
translation.fr:
Vous pensez que c'est impossible,
mais ça ne l'est pas.

translation.en: If I can survive out here, anybody can.
translation.fr:
Si je peux survivre,
tout le monde peut.

translation.en: It's like a good friend once told me.
translation.fr: Comme un ami me l'a dit un jour :

translation.en: Good instincts are earned by making mistakes.
translation.fr:
un bon instinct s'acquiert
en faisant des erreurs.

translation.en: If you're lucky enough to survive a few mistakes,
translation.fr: Si tu survis à quelques bourdes,

translation.en: you're gonna do all right out here.
In this recording, you'll find everything I know about our new world.
translation.fr:
Cet enregistrement contient ce que je sais
de notre nouveau monde.

translation.en: Most of this I had to learn the hard way.
translation.fr: J'ai presque tout appris à mes dépens.

translation.en: Hopefully, it'll make your way a little easier.
translation.fr: J'espère que ça facilitera votre voyage.

translation.en: So, crank open that hatch.
Okay, come on.
[Joel] Breathe some fresh air. Go. Live your life.
translation.fr:
Respirez l'air frais.
Sortez. Vivez votre vie.

translation.en: It won't be easy, but it'll be worth it.
translation.fr:
Ce ne sera pas facile,
mais ça en vaudra la peine.

translation.en: I traveled 85 miles to find that what I'd been missing below ground for seven years
translation.fr:
J'ai fait 135 km pour découvrir
que ce qui m'avait manqué pendant 7 ans

translation.en: was right above my head this whole time.
translation.fr: était juste au-dessus de ma tête.

translation.en: And it's incredible.
Oh, and one last thing. Don't settle.
translation.fr: Une dernière chose. Ne lâchez rien.

translation.en: You don't have to. Not even at the end of the world.
translation.fr: Vous n'êtes pas obligé. Même si c'est la fin du monde.

translation.en: Signing off,
Joel Dawson.
[Minnow] "Don't settle"? That's my line.
It's a long journey, kid. I hope you know what you're doing.
translation.fr:
La route est longue.
J'espère qu'il sait ce qu'il fait.

translation.en: [Minnow] He definitely doesn't. Snow Spiders will probably get him.
translation.fr:
J'en doute.
Les Araignées des neiges le tueront.

translation.en: -[Clyde] That's not a good way to go. -[Minnow] They will tear him apart.
translation.fr:
- Sale façon de mourir.
- Elles le déchiquetteront.

translation.en: -[Clyde] Nah, he'll figure it out. -[Minnow] Possibly.
